div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvj die
mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day Jonet trale lauchfullie Callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' for the wranguyshaldin of Certan gudis of airschip
fra Jonet Westlande and cristiane Westlande et cetera quharfor James
of Kennarty hir Spous come Souerte be his hande vphaldin
to caus' the saide Jonet to Entir befor the balyeis one
friday that next Cumis and ansuer' perempturlie to the said' borghe
and the balyeis with consent of the saide James one that ane part Ande
Dauid talyour one that vthir part assignit the saide day to the saide
James and Jonet to ansuer' perempturlie to the said' borghe'

the saide day mathow branche tuk to preyve that he hed' pait
William henrison' the fyve franche Crovnis contenit in his
Obligacioun this day or the court Rys'

Eodem die gilbertus monrow conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore alexandri chamer
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis laysk Et egidius con monrow conuictus
pro perturbio dicti Johannis Cuj emendabunt ut Jura volunt Et dictus
Johannes amerciatur pro perturbio dictorum gilberti et Egidij quibus emendabit
ut Jura volunt Et dictus gilbertus persoluet vnam libram cerem ad
lumen Sancti sanguinis Et si dictus gilbertus conuictus fuerit in postrum
pro perturbio Johannis mathesone aut alterius persone Soluet ad
fabricam ecclesie xx s'

Infra dictus gilbertus monrow con conuictus fuit pro perturbio Johannis ma
thesone Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Katherina prat fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
georgius byssat suum legittimum procuratorem actorem factorem et Specialem
nuncium Ac dan' et conceden' eidem et suis substitutis pluribus
aut vni ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum omnia bona sibi
Jure hereditario et alias contingen' racione decessus parentum suorum Et de
Receptis acquitandis Ac in omnibus aliis causis et querelis
actionibus et contrauersiis ipsam concernentibus aut tangere valen' promitten'
de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus terminis
et clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Agnes prat fecit constituit creauit et nominauit
Johannem tulibow suum legittimum et Indubitatum procuratorem actorem factorem et
negociatorum suorum gestorem ac nuncium specialem dan' et concenden' eidem
et suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj a petendum exigendum et recipiendum
omnia bona sibi Jure hereditario et alias contingen' per decessum parentum
suorum Et de receptis acquitandis Ac in omnibus aliis causis
querelis actionibus et contrauersiis Ipsam concernentibus aut tangere valen'
promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiora forma procuratorij cum omnibus
terminis et clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said' day It was preuit that mathow branche has pait to
William henrison' tua franche crovnis tuentj s' pait in Clath
one his behalf to Androw meldrum and Ane franche Crovne
was forgevin to the said' mathow of the fyve crovnis
franche money contenit in ane Obligacioun of the said'
Mathovn' deliuerit to the said' William Obefor'

the saide day the assis' was releschit of thar aithis anent the
borghe' fundin be Jonhne of mar' apone William Scrogis for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of j barrel salmond' j barrel grils' vij s' and xix iij lax
and thai continevit the said' actioun' be the moutht of William blinsel
forspekar to friday that next cumis In hoip of concord'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo die mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day Jonet traill with malcum Crag hir forspekar'
denyit the airschip clamit be Jonet Westlande and cristian'
Westlande contenit in thar' bill Ande the balyeis assignit
friday that next cumis the xxvij day of August to Dauid
liell and Dauid talyour forspekaris of the saidez Jonet and cristian'
to preiw quhat airschip thai clame be deces' of vmquhill
Johne Westland' thar brothir

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die Augusti
anno quo Supra

Eodem die Willelmus loremar' conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore
prelocutoris Alexandri chamer prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio mariote nachtj coniugis
henrici Rede Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Augustj quo supra

the saide day Johne low Come Souerte be his hande to Entir
William loremar' befor the aldirman and balyes one friday that
next cumis to mak ane Amendis to marion' nachtj spous'
to henry Rede for the stribulance done to hir' gif he ples' nocht
the saide henry and his frendis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vicesimoseptimo die mensis Augusti anno quosupra

head.add: procuratorium Jonete Westland et cristine Westland

div.p:
Eodem die Joneta Westland et cristina Westland fecerunt constituerunt
et ordinarunt Dauid liell et Dauid talyeour coniunctim suos legitimos procuratores
actores et factores dan' et conceden' eisdem et eorum alterj suam
legitimam potestatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad petendum
exigendum et Recipiendum a Joneta traile aliisque quibuscumque omnia bona
sibi Jure hereditario contingentur per decessum Johannis Westland fratris suj
Et de Receptis acquitandis detinendis prosequendis agendis defendendis
Promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said daj Alexander hay offerit him Reddy to deliuere to Johne
King the tua barrellis of ter optenit vpone him be Johne
King as merchand to merchand

The said day Johne King Offerit him Reddy to Ressaue fra
Alexander hay tua barrellis of ter optenit one him obefor and offerit
him tile vnderly four of his nichbouris vnsuspek gif the said
tua barrellis that the said alexander offerit him war sufficient
or nocht and tuk Instrument tharapone befor patrik chernsid thomas
Watsone Androw stevinsone William scrimgeour and Dauid fyf

Curia balliuorum burgj de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday the thride day of Sep
tembre next to Cum to William scrogis to preiwe the gudis of Arschipe
clamit be him one medy crag be deces' of Androw scrogis his brothir

The saide day the balyes assignit the law day next eftir Sanct
michaell day to Robert athoill to ansuer' to Johne Wormet for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of j barrel Salmond' j barrel girls' and iij
s' of Siluer for met fische and Alexander chavmer come Souerte to
entir the said' Robert the saide day

The said' day Richard' redhede requirit the balyeis to ger' warne
William buchan to comper befor tham one friday next to Cum and Androw
gordon' his man to ansuer' to him Anent the stribulance done to him

the said' day gilbert Riburne grantit him aving to mastir Dauid
menyes xxij s' of annuell quhilkis he Is oblist him to pay
to sere Androw Colison' betuix this and michaelmas day next to Cum

The said' day Alexander hay falyet in his preyve Anent the iijxx
lame skinnis followit be Johne Kinge eftir the tenor' of the akis
maid' obefor and the saide Jonhne has preuit the said' skinnis
was in his pok as the assis' deliuerit Obefor'

Eodem die Willelmus gentilman amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore gilberti
menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Duncanj portar cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt et Idem Duncanus quitus de perturbio eius

Eodem die Willelmus gentilman amerciatur per assisam ut supra pro perturbio famuli
Johannis greyn' et domus sue cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

the saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
gilbert menyes forspekar that William belty hed' wrangit and falyiting
of keping of nychtburschip to Kintor the Relict of patry
clerk Anent the vuirmyll for the quhilk he was in Ane Amerciament
of the court and aw to Amend' as law will and forber' in tym to Cum'

The saide day William belty dischargit him of his tak of the
half of the vuirmyll and Requirit Alexander Red' to Intromet with the
Samyn furth with and he suld' deliuer his part of It with ale necessar
stuf according' tharto and pay his martimes male tharof next to Cum
And' the said' Alexander Oblist him to the ballies thomas leslie and Johne of
mar' to Intromet with the said' demi myll and to pay the maill to the tovne
Induringe the termes of the assidacion maid' to the said' William tharapon
et cetera

The xxiij day of August the yer' of god jM vc and ane yer' Johne Wormet
Androw murray gilbert menyes James Colison' Androw Cullan William blinsele and
Alexander gray was chosin be the hall communite of abirdene and suorne the gret aithe
to taxt and extent the Some of jc merkis and x crovnis to be gevin
to the ambaxat passing to the completing of the kingis mariage et cetera
eftir the tenor of our Soueran lordis lettres
drectit directit
tharupon'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis Augusti Anno quosupra

The said day the baillies assignit friday the gild court day nixt
eftir the fest of michelmas to meddy crag to bring thome chapman
and Androw stevinsone in hir hand and preif that scho had nocht the gudis
gevin in bill be William scrogis eldar in tyme of the said Androwis deces'
scho itis quhit of the said gudis clamit be the said William and
gif scho preffis nocht scho sall ansuer to the said William

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
vjo die Septembris anno quo Supra

Eodem die Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod Jacobus
Crukschank erit Indempnis pro henrico bavne aliter quam
per viam Juris Et Dauid theman deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Jacobus erit Indempnis pro dicto henrico aliter quam per viam Juris Et
quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum suos fideiussores

The said the ballies assignit friday that nixt cumis to Johne Kyd to ansuer
to the borgh' one him be William blinsele peremptourly becaus' the said
Johne denyit and cled the court and the said baillies assignit him the said day
for waiknes of the court

the xxvj day of marche the yer of god jM iiijc nyntj and viij yeris to Dauy mar'
sere Johne ruthirfurd' aldirman lent vj s' viij d'
Alexander menyes vj s' viiij d'
Robert blinsele vj s' viij d'
thomas prat xiij s' iiij d'
Dauy menyes vj s' viij d'
Alexander chamer vj s' viij d'

The x day of September' the yer' of god jM vc and j yer' William
buchan baxtar grantit and entirit him tennend' to the aldirman and balyeis
In the tovnis name to the half of the vuirmyll with the pertinence
quhilk William beltj hede In tak for ale the termes contenit in his
assedacioun maide vndir the common sale Ande oblist him be his
landis and gudis for the pament of the maill of the samyn the saide
William belty payande the martymes maile next to cum

the xx day of September' the yer' of god' jM vc and j yer
William chamer grantit him aving' to Dauid mar' ane
barrell of Salmond' Sufficient merchand' gude the next yer'
to cum to help to pay the said' Dauidis wattir maile
to be pait as the mydsommer' next to Cum et cetera

the xxv day of September' the yer of god' jM vc and j yer befor
gilbert menyes William Kintor cherllis Steuynson' and Dauid liell
William gregory maid' constitut and ordanit mariory gregory spous' to
thomas Waus and Elizibeth gregory his procuratouris coniunctlie and seueralie
in all actionis contrauersiis and querellis concerning him to his agan cumin
to the burghe of abirdene fra the partis beyond' Ande specialie tile ask
resone and tak his gudis quhatsumeuire fra Johne low his gud'
fadir and Anny makallon' his modir and giff acquitance tharupon'
And' gif god' weseys him or his agan cumin he lest and gaf
ale his gudis to the said' mariory and Elizibeth his sistiris thai
gevand' part to the kirk and demi merk to the quhit freris And'
atour the said' William assignit xl s' to the said' mariory to be
Resit and resavit fra the saide Johne and Anny of his avne gudis
quhilk he resavit fra hir obefor in penny and pennyworthtis
And' gif neid' be the said' Johne and Anny thir ayris executouris and
assignez' to follou and persew for the said' xl s' and the gudis pertening
to me and the Samyn to resaue and of thir Resatis acquitance to gif
with condicion neuir to ask mair' tharof in tym' to Cum promitten' de
Rato et grato with ale vthir clausulis necessar and oporton' oblising' him
to releyve his procuratouris of ale skatht et cetera nochtwithstanding the saide
William ordanit this procuratory to ces' tile his agan cumin les'wys'
than god' wesy his modir / excep the xl s' quhilk he ordanit
the said' mariory his sistir to follow persew and Resaue
